DIA_PirGuardBen_FirstWarn_03_01: Cortez told me everything. You can come in.
DIA_PirGuardBen_FirstWarn_03_02: I'm impressed! You beat Ben... no one believed we'd ever see him on his knees!
DIA_PirGuardBen_FirstWarn_15_03: Is he inside? I have a matter.
DIA_PirGuardBen_FirstWarn_03_04: Yes. Come in. I just don't know if he wants to see you.
DIA_PirGuardBen_FirstWarn_03_05: Not so fast. Ben is currently indisposed.
DIA_PirGuardBen_FirstWarn_03_06: He doesn't wish anyone to disturb him.
DIA_PirGuardBen_SecondWarn_03_01: I think I made it clear last time...
DIA_PirGuardBen_LastWarn_03_01: Damn idiot. I'll teach you some manners.
